name: Sega Rally Championship
overview:
The Ultimate in Off Road Arcade Racing game!
Experience Rally car racing. Power through turns, fish tail through dirt, blast through mud, get some serious air on bumps and jumps. To be a master at Rally you need to anticipate turns, maximize your car's capabilities, and control the unique physics of off road racing.
• 3D polygon based graphics deliver the thrill of arcade racing
• Four challenging courses: desert, forest, mountain and a bonus lake side course
• Six unique Rally cars armed with speed and traction to handle off road racing hazards
